mapper.insert: insert into t_resp_schema ( create_date, modify_date, doc_id, module_id, code, name, description, cust_schema, type, ref_schema_id ) values ( #{createDate}, #{modifyDate}, #{docId}, #{moduleId}, #{code}, #{name}, #{description}, #{custSchema}, #{type}, #{refSchemaId} )
mapper.select: select * from t_resp_schema where id = #{schemaId} and doc_id = #{docId}
